# isPresentingGameCenter

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the game is presenting the Game Center dashboard.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPresentingGameCenter: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

This property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the player taps the access point control and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] when the player dismisses the Game Center dashboard. This is an observable property.

## Displaying the access point

- **isActive**: A Boolean value that determines whether to display the access point.
- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the access point is visible.
- **showHighlights**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to display highlights for achievements and current ranks for leaderboards.
